column1: * 1918 - J.R.R. Tolkien is transferred to Savoy Convalescent Hospital
* 1951 - Second day of the Congrès Internationale de Philologie Moderne at the wikipedia:University of Liège
column2: a conference in which J.R.R. Tolkien delivers the paper "Middle English Losenger (essay)".
11 September 1957 reports from the International Fantasy Award

column1: * 1982 - The ninth episode of the new version of the The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series) of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC.
* 2010 - Bulgarian Tolkien Societys 6th Tolkien-Fest in wikipedia:Sofia.
* 2015 - Oxonmoot 2015 at http://www.sant.ox.ac.uk St Antonys College.
* 2016 - Oxonmoot 2016 at http://www.sant.ox.ac.uk St Antonys College.
